rules.title: House Rules
rules.description: We appreciate your cooperation to ensure a pleasant stay for all our guests
rules.checkInDesc: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be arranged based on availability.
rules.maxGuestsDesc: The property accommodates up to {{capacity}} guests. Any additional guests must be approved in advance.
rules.quietDesc: Respect quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Please be mindful of neighbors.
rules.smokingDesc: Smoking is not permitted inside the house. Designated outdoor areas available.
rules.partiesDesc: Parties, events, or large gatherings are not allowed without prior written permission.
rules.respectDesc: Please treat the home and its contents with care. Any damages will be charged.
rules.cleanUpDesc: Please leave the property in good condition. Excessive cleaning may incur additional fees.
rules.noPetsDesc: Pets are not allowed on the premises under any circumstances.
rules.waterDesc: Be mindful of water usage. Please report any leaks immediately.
rules.garbageDesc: Dispose of trash properly in designated bins. Follow local recycling guidelines.
rules.securityDesc: Each guest is responsible for locking doors and windows to ensure the security of their belongings.
rules.lostDesc: If any item is left on the property, please notify us as soon as possible.
rules.checkOutDesc: When leaving the property, we kindly request that you:
rules.takeTrash: Take trash to the designated area
rules.reservationDesc: Please review our booking and cancellation terms
rules.documentationDesc: To make a reservation, identification of the person booking is required along with a copy of their identity document and proof of address.
rules.deposit50: A 50% deposit is required at the time of booking
rules.remaining50: The remaining 50% is due one month before the initial reservation date
rules.fullPayment: If the reservation is made less than one month before the stay begins, 100% payment is required at the time of booking
rules.refund30: 30% refund if cancelled one month or more before the stay begins
rules.noRefund: No refund if cancellation occurs less than one month before the stay begins
rules.thankYou: We appreciate your cooperation and hope you enjoy your stay.

footer.aboutDesc: A century-old heritage home in Boquete, Panama. Four generations of family stewardship, four botanical bedrooms, endless memories.
